iwi_data.runanga_trust: Te Rūnanga Nui o Te Aupōuri
iwi_data.governance_structure: Seven trustees elected by the iwi whānui
iwi_data.rohe_details: From Te Wharau (at North Cape) west to Te Reinga; then South to Puketutu (a hill, a mile north of the present Kaitaia Golf Course) on to Te Oneroa-A-Tohe (Ninety Mile Beach)
iwi_data.legal_status: Post-Treaty settlement governance entity; Mandated iwi organisation (MFA 2004); Iwi authority (RMA 1991)
iwi_data.data_sources: Te Kāhui Māngai; Te Aupōuri website

iwi_data.physical_address: Te Manawa o Ngāti Kurī, Far North Road, Ngātaki
iwi_data.postal_address: 5399 Main Road North, Ngataki, RD4, Kaitāia 0484
iwi_data.governance_structure: Three persons representing 'Ngāti Kurī Electorate'; three persons representing 'Muriwhenua Electorate'; Five persons representing 'General Electorate'
iwi_data.major_landmarks: Cape Reinga/Te Rerenga Wairua, Te Oneroa-a-Tohe/Ninety Mile Beach (dual names)
iwi_data.legal_status: Post-Treaty settlement governance entity; Mandated iwi organisation (MFA 2004); Iwi Aquaculture Organisation; Iwi authority (RMA 1991); Tūhono organisation
iwi_data.data_sources: Te Kāhui Māngai; Te Arawhiti; Ngāti Kurī website

iwi_data.governance_structure: Two representatives from each Ngāti Kahu marae plus Auckland-based taurahere

health_services.name: Ngāti Kahu Social and Health Services

iwi_data.data_sources: Te Kāhui Māngai; Ngāti Kahu websites

iwi_data.governance_structure: One trustee from each of 19 active marae and two taura here (4 marae not represented)
iwi_data.rohe_details: From Hokianga eastwards to Mangataipa, north along Raetea ranges, down Pamapuria River to Maimaru, across to Awanui, west to Hukatere on Te Oneroa-a-Tōhē, down coastline past Ahipara to Hokianga
iwi_data.legal_status: Post-Treaty settlement governance entity; Mandated iwi organisation (MFA 2004); Iwi Aquaculture Organisation; Iwi authority (RMA 1991)
iwi_data.data_sources: Te Kāhui Māngai; Te Arawhiti; Te Rarawa website
iwi_data.notes: One of five iwi in Te Hiku o Te Ika a Maui

iwi_data.alt_physical_address: Ngāi Takoto House, Cnr Mathews Avenue and Melba Street, Kaitāia

australia_office.postal_address: PO Box 5186 Chullora Post Shop, Chullora NSW, 2190 Australia

iwi_data.governance_structure: Five representatives chosen from Ngāi Takoto marae committee members
iwi_data.legal_status: Post-Treaty settlement governance entity; Iwi authority (RMA 1991)
iwi_data.data_sources: Te Kāhui Māngai; Ngāi Takoto website

iwi_data.governance_structure: 14 trustees representing affiliated marae in the Ngātiwai takiwā
iwi_data.legal_entity: Registered under the Charitable Trusts Act 1957
iwi_data.legal_status: Mandated iwi authority; Iwi authority (RMA 1991); Mandated iwi organisation (MFA 2004)
iwi_data.data_sources: Te Kāhui Māngai; Ngātiwai Trust Board website

notes: This batch covers 6 of the 8 major Northland iwi. Ngāpuhi already has comprehensive data in the database. Email addresses were not available for all iwi through public sources.
